text.more:
This visualization was created by Ricardo Gomez Zamudio. 

Template provided by InteractiveVis project.
Information of relations between transformative skills was extracted from Inner Development Goals Framework.
text.intro: Transformational skills for Sustainable Development based on the Inner Development Framework developed by academia, companies and government partners. This framework bring together these skills within 5 dimensions: Being (brown), Thinking (pink), Relating (red), Collaborating (orange) and Acting (dark red).
text.title: How does transformational skills relate to each other?
